TopicTitle: [0.90] DDSLoader 1.9 (Mar 9) - Loads DDS Texture "Boringly fast" edition

Articles.Content: After converting hi-res skybox and planet textures for Texture Replacer, game's memory footprint was reduced at least by 300 MB. Thank you, sarbian.

Sorry if i sound dumb but i am an inexperienced end user, what i have to do for this mod to reduce the ram requirements and loading time is to manually (via a program) convert every imagefile from gamedata folder into another format? Have i got it entirely wrong?

How time consuming/easy is that? Is there any other "dumb" end user that has already done it?

The "for dummies" converter tool is here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98672

It's not up to date with the last version of the loader but it should do fine. I would recommend to install ATM too, or at least the ATM directory that has the exception ("BoulderCo\ActiveTextureManagerConfigs")

after updating to latest version (1.6) i found some weirdness with my suits i use with TR

DSS images i use:

EVAtextureNRM.dds

EVAvisor.dds

kerbalHelmetNRM.dds

kerbalMainNRM.dds

KerbinScaledSpace300.dds

all other images are *.png

I use ATM and my graphic settings are at max (gtx 670)
It worked with version 1.5 ? If yes can you put the dds & png somewhere ?

It worked with version 1.5 ? If yes can you put the dds & png somewhere ?

Yes it works with 1.5 .Where should i put dds and pngs?
Dropbox, or something like rapidshare

Dropbox, or something like rapidshare

oh,the pngs are from Color-coordinated Astronaut Suits and dds are from Pimp My Kerbals v1.1 by ProoT + Shaw's updates .

It also happens on start screen.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Just thought I drop in to mention that apparently Part Catalog also needs to be on the blacklist, no icons or buttons appearing for me.

oh,the pngs are from Color-coordinated Astronaut Suits and dds are from Pimp My Kerbals v1.1 by ProoT + Shaw's updates .

I can't use your second link. It is not a post link but a link to what is page 137 of the thread for you. And since I changed my setting to see 50 post par page I have only 30 page in that thread. So please repost it using a post link ( the one with a #XXX ) on the righr side of a post.
Yes page 137 post #1362 in TR thread.

New version.

1.7 Fix error with some DXT1/5 and make Apply() optional for the plugin who need to load a texture but don't want to display it (resource map,...)

This should fix sebi.zzr bug
1.7 fixed the graphics glitches that I experienced with 1.6! Thanks Sarbian!
Thank you very much,and somehow 1.7 reduced 300MB on system memory load.

Excellent!

Thanks so much for this.
Anyone have any luck using this on mac? What are you using to convert textures/what settings?

Anyone have any luck using this on mac? What are you using to convert textures/what settings?

This should work on Mac, if someone compiles it: https://github.com/ducakar/img2dds. You can also convert textures manually, one by one, with Photoshop or Gimp (if you are a really masochistic person).

This should work on Mac, if someone compiles it: https://github.com/ducakar/img2dds. You can also convert textures manually, one by one, with Photoshop or Gimp (if you are a really masochistic person).

sh: ./img2dds/OSX64/img2dds: No such file or directory

I don't think any mods are distributing textures as DDS yet. Hopefully that will change.

I said it should work on Mac IF SOMEONE COMPILES IT for Mac.

I don't think any mods are distributing textures as DDS yet. Hopefully that will change.

TextureReplacer packs I packaged use DDS textures (Extended Sylith's pack and updated Pimp My Kerbals).

The mod is young and I m sure some were waiting for stability. Right now it seems to be bug free and I don't see new large feature coming in. Maybe some more numbers on loading time may help other seeing the benefits.
